channel.title: [508] HD - RuneScape DemonWars Custom [508] Now with x64 client<3
channel.description:
[size=36pt]PLZ reply when download bcuz if this page hits page 10 of server downloads i will remove[/size]
[size=14pt]RSDW Site:[/size] [url=http://www.DemonWars.tk]www.DemonWars.tk[/url]
VIEWS: 30000 REPLIES: 446 DOWNLOADS: 4000
[size=18pt]Its here![/size] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/logos2.gif[/img] {LOGO WAS MADE BY ME, well the moving part then the logo itself is from jagex} ----------------------------------------------------------- IF you need any help, you can add me on Teamviewer my ID is: 752 390 033 (you can ask me for the pass when u need help, (i do not allow you to go to my pc) -----------------------------------------------------------
GET READY
My latest project.
Features: 1, clan wars (100%) 2, castle wars (90%) 3, god wars dungeon (85%) 4, Transformations: Kolodion - Graador - Kree'Ara - Zileyana - K'ril 5, bounty hunter 6, fist of guthix (Reaper's lair) {in the cave of FOG are fear reapers that drop 100 to 1000 fog tokens} 7, NEW SUMMONING MONSTERS 8, Duel Arena (90%) {there is a glitch wich makes the client crash} [im trying to fix it] 9, Grand Exchange! { yes now you can buy and sell all alone!) 10, Gods: all the Gods like Kree'Ara drop a special axe that fully transforms you into Kree'Ara, Graador drops a axe for Graador ect. 11, Gods and Demons are in a war (they attack each other) 12, New magic system: you can now cast spells at npcs and players with the normal magic books. 13, 1 server, 5 clients! (you can now use LD and HD in one server) 14, NEW HOME! (your home is now at Zanaris{ AKA lost city}) 15, REMOVED CUSTOMS: i have removed most of the customs like most of u wanted. 16, BETTER PVP: you can now PVP against NPC PLAYERS at LD and normal players at both LD and HD. 17, You can attack players while in GOD form. 18, A new secret has bin added to skilling, find it! 19, 24 skills! (all work) 20, You can spawn 2 sarjeant Grimspikes or 2 Black Demons who will fight each other 21, As usual when you die you go to the Grim Reaper. 22, Combat level raised to max: 208! 23, Max HP raised to: 200! 24, Max skill level raised to: 120! 25, easy GWD tele command (::gwd) 26, GE clerk at home 27, 7 shops at home 28, D claws at LD 29, Spirit Shields at LD 30, FULL LD AND HD 31, New ::starter 32, New ::home 33, New ::master 34, Better NPC VS NPC Sytem 35, Added over 25 NVSN Variables 36, Added 123 NPCS (total of 342) 37, Added 19 Extra shops 38, Better banking system (tabs stay when logout) 39, Fight pits 100% (made by Drowning) 40, Added 2 Prayer Books
41, [size=24pt]NPC MULTI BARRAGE!! (yes it works! 100%)[/size]
42, [size=26pt]Constitution (90% only need to figure out how to change the max displayed hp from 255 to 990)[/size]
[size=14pt]43, {508} HD CUSTOM CLIENT FULLSCREEN!!!![/size]
[size=14pt]44, Torva at HD and LD![/size]
[size=18pt]45, Added Custom NPC dialogue (meaning that if u talk 2 a npc you get atleast 3 topic options [/size]
[size=18pt]46, Dungeoneering will be added in the 2.5 version[/size]
[size=18pt]47, Max HP has bin raised to 999999999 at V2.5[/size]
[size=18pt]48:server re-make! it now has a standard of 10k health and u can hit up to 30k!![/size]
(508 loading 525 aborted for the great amount of bugs)
[size=18pt]RSDW Cursors[/size] [url=http://uppit.com/c6fcsqeq49ue/RSDW_cursors.zip]http://uppit.com/c6fcsqeq49ue/RSDW_cursors.zip[/url]
Skills:
Attack, Defence and strength= 100%
Ranged= 90%
Magic= 85% Magic vs player (ancients) = 90% Magic vs player (modern) = 90% (still adding spells) Magic vs Npc (modern, ancients and lunar) = 90% (need to add projectiles and sounds)
Prayer= 100%
Construction= 0%
Decided to stop working on that.
FireMaking= 100%
[size=24pt]Crafting= 50%[/size]
All other skills work perfectly= 100%
On the 17th i was celebrating my 1 year anniversary on RSPS Coding and moparisthebest.com [code]Minecraft Name:RSC Name: Date Registered: August 17, 2010, 05:24:59 AMLocal Time:August 17, 2011, 04:58:29 PMLast Active: Today at 04:58:20 PM Signature:
(-:Owner of RuneScape DemonWars:-)
(-:RuneScape Demon Wars FORUMS:-) (-: http://www.DemonWars.tk:-) (-:Free To Register:-) [/code]
///////Pictures\\\\\\\
[size=12pt]NEW[/size] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/staffsshop.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/photo2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/logosmall.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/levels.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/home.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/HD.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/HDCUSTOM.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/gesee.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/ge100.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/GE.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1008.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1007.jpg[/img]
[size=96pt]HEY![/size] if u like halo and Red VS Blue look here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,518203.msg3765531.html#msg3765531]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,518203.msg3765531.html#msg3765531[/url]
[img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1006.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1005.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1004.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1003.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0025.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0024.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0023.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0022.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0021.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/photo1.jpg[/img]
[size=36pt]Pre-View Video:[/size] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-EvFOgvgQZk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-EvFOgvgQZk[/url]
[size=36pt]///////Downloads\\\\\\\[/size]
Full Package:
[size=14pt][url=http://up.ht/kcxKgs][HD] RSDW [HD].rar - 121.8 Mb[/url][/size]
[size=18pt](x64) Client[/size]
[URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ehoxjcrjpyutb05/Demonwars%20%28x64%29.rar?dl=1]Download the RSDW (x64) client for 64 bits pc now.[/URL] Non Anti-leech: [size=12pt][url=http://up.ht/ntp2EJ]http://up.ht/ntp2EJ[/url][/size]
Keep in mind that if u release a server that is based on this one and you don't have permission from me i will report to a Moderator and the topic will be removed.
Developer And Owner: DemonWars
_-Credits-_ client(LD) : 50% to Lurd-layton and 20% to owner of Batscape for sprites client(HD) : 70% Hotyute 29% noobs are ftw (for the fantastic explain about adding HD models) 1% me for all the work ;)
source: 35% Palidino76 base from Drowning508 - (I HAVE PERMISSION!) - Without i would not be able to make this server :D 65% Me
======== Grafix Versions ========
HD: High detail Resizeble, {has custom models} High detail Fullscreen, {has custom models!} High detail Fixed, {has Custom Models!}
LD: Low detail Resizeble, {has custom models} Low detail Fullscreen, {has custom models} Low detail Fixed, {has custom models}
===== End of Grafix versions ======
[size=24pt]Common errors[/size] ----------------------------------- js5connect: There is something wrong with the way you connect both the server and client, my advice is to test the client with a other server and vice-versa (or update java, it might improve the connection) (this error should appear at: "connecting to update server" or "loading updates") ----------------------------------- Game_caps_vesa: your video driver is out of date, try updating it (this error should appear at: "Loading 3D library") ----------------------------------- Error_game_dll (dont know the exact error): there either is a problem with the server or client, try using a other client with the server or a other server with the client. (this error should appear at the "Connecting" section) ---------------------------------- if the error contains: already in use: you are running a server at the same IP that you are trying to run this one, close the other one in order to run this one ---------------------------------- Please report any other errors and ill be glad to help you with it.
[size=14pt]END ERRORS[/size]
[size=24pt]A fun idea:[/size]
[size=12pt] take a few screenshots of u doing something cool or funny on the server with HD and upload it at additional options, then reply with the screenshot, the best person with the best screenshot gets send a link with my special DemonWars armor for the client before it will be released at the v3 and u may also choose a color for it. [/size]
READ THIS!!!!
THIS SERVER IS MADE BY: DEMONWARS
[size=36pt]MOST IMPORTANT!!!,[/size]
THIS SERVER IS NOT LEECHED IN ANY WAY!
I DO HAVE PERMISSION FOR THE DROWNING PALI BASE FROM DUHPK!
[size=36pt][shadow=red,left]Read Readme files in server folders[/shadow][/size]

item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[size=36pt]PLZ reply when download bcuz if this page hits page 10 of server downloads i will remove[/size]

[size=14pt]RSDW Site:[/size]
www.DemonWars.tk

VIEWS: 30000
REPLIES: 446
DOWNLOADS: 4000

[size=18pt]Its here![/size]

{LOGO WAS MADE BY ME, well the moving part then the logo itself is from jagex}

IF you need any help,
you can add me on Teamviewer
my ID is: 752 390 033
(you can ask me for the pass when u need help,
(i do not allow you to go to my pc)

GET READY

My latest project.

Features:
1, clan wars (100%)
2, castle wars (90%)
3, god wars dungeon (85%)
4, Transformations: Kolodion - Graador - Kree’Ara - Zileyana - K’ril
5, bounty hunter
6, fist of guthix (Reaper’s lair) {in the cave of FOG are fear reapers that drop 100 to 1000 fog tokens}
7, NEW SUMMONING MONSTERS
8, Duel Arena (90%) {there is a glitch wich makes the client crash} [im trying to fix it]
9, Grand Exchange! { yes now you can buy and sell all alone!)
10, Gods: all the Gods like Kree’Ara drop a special axe that fully transforms you into Kree’Ara, Graador drops a axe for Graador ect.
11, Gods and Demons are in a war (they attack each other)
12, New magic system: you can now cast spells at npcs and players with the normal magic books.
13, 1 server, 5 clients! (you can now use LD and HD in one server)
14, NEW HOME! (your home is now at Zanaris{ AKA lost city})
15, REMOVED CUSTOMS: i have removed most of the customs like most of u wanted.
16, BETTER PVP: you can now PVP against NPC PLAYERS at LD and normal players at both LD and HD.
17, You can attack players while in GOD form.
18, A new secret has bin added to skilling, find it!
19, 24 skills! (all work)
20, You can spawn 2 sarjeant Grimspikes or 2 Black Demons who will fight each other
21, As usual when you die you go to the Grim Reaper.
22, Combat level raised to max: 208!
23, Max HP raised to: 200!
24, Max skill level raised to: 120!
25, easy GWD tele command (::gwd)
26, GE clerk at home
27, 7 shops at home
28, D claws at LD
29, Spirit Shields at LD
30, FULL LD AND HD
31, New ::starter
32, New ::home
33, New ::master
34, Better NPC VS NPC Sytem
35, Added over 25 NVSN Variables
36, Added 123 NPCS (total of 342)
37, Added 19 Extra shops
38, Better banking system (tabs stay when logout)
39, Fight pits 100% (made by Drowning)
40, Added 2 Prayer Books

41, [size=24pt]NPC MULTI BARRAGE!! (yes it works! 100%)[/size]

42, [size=26pt]Constitution (90% only need to figure out how to change the max displayed hp from 255 to 990)[/size]

[size=14pt]43, {508} HD CUSTOM CLIENT FULLSCREEN!!![/size]

[size=14pt]44, Torva at HD and LD![/size]

[size=18pt]45, Added Custom NPC dialogue (meaning that if u talk 2 a npc you get atleast 3 topic options [/size]

[size=18pt]46, Dungeoneering will be added in the 2.5 version[/size]

[size=18pt]47, Max HP has bin raised to 999999999 at V2.5[/size]

[size=18pt]48:server re-make! it now has a standard of 10k health and u can hit up to 30k!![/size]

(508 loading 525 aborted for the great amount of bugs)

[size=18pt]RSDW Cursors[/size]
http://uppit.com/c6fcsqeq49ue/RSDW_cursors.zip

Skills:

Attack, Defence and strength= 100%

Ranged= 90%

Magic= 85%
Magic vs player (ancients) = 90%
Magic vs player (modern) = 90% (still adding spells)
Magic vs Npc (modern, ancients and lunar) = 90% (need to add projectiles and sounds)

Prayer= 100%

Construction= 0%

Decided to stop working on that.

FireMaking= 100%

[size=24pt]Crafting= 50%[/size]

All other skills work perfectly= 100%

On the 17th i was celebrating my 1 year anniversary on RSPS Coding and moparisthebest.com

[code]Minecraft Name:RSC Name:
Date Registered: August 17, 2010, 05:24:59 AMLocal Time:August 17, 2011, 04:58:29 PMLast Active: Today at 04:58:20 PM

(-:RuneScape Demon Wars FORUMS:-)
(-: http://www.DemonWars.tk
(-:Free To Register:-)
[/code]

///////Pictures\\\\

[size=12pt]NEW[/size]











[size=96pt]HEY![/size]
if u like halo and Red VS Blue look here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,518203.msg3765531.html#msg3765531















[size=36pt]Pre-View Video:[/size]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-EvFOgvgQZk

Keep in mind that if u release a server that is based on this one and you don’t have permission from me i will report to a Moderator and the topic will be removed.

Developer And Owner: DemonWars

client(LD) :
50% to Lurd-layton and 20% to owner of Batscape for sprites
client(HD) :

source:

======== Grafix Versions ========

HD:
High detail Resizeble, {has custom models}
High detail Fullscreen, {has custom models!}

===== End of Grafix versions ======

[size=24pt]Common errors[/size]

js5connect: There is something wrong with the way you connect both the server and client, my advice is to test the client with a other server and vice-versa (or update java, it might improve the connection) (this error should appear at: “connecting to update server” or “loading updates”)

Game_caps_vesa: your video driver is out of date, try updating it (this error should appear at: “Loading 3D library”)

Error_game_dll (dont know the exact error): there either is a problem with the server or client, try using a other client with the server or a other server with the client. (this error should appear at the “Connecting” section)

if the error contains: already in use: you are running a server at the same IP that you are trying to run this one, close the other one in order to run this one

Please report any other errors and ill be glad to help you with it.

[size=14pt]END ERRORS[/size]

[size=24pt]A fun idea:[/size]

[size=12pt]
take a few screenshots of u doing something cool or funny on the server with HD and upload it at additional options,
then reply with the screenshot, the best person with the best screenshot gets send a link with my special DemonWars armor for the client before it will be released at the v3
and u may also choose a color for it.
[/size]

READ THIS!!!

THIS SERVER IS MADE BY: DEMONWARS

[size=36pt]MOST IMPORTANT!!!,[/size]

THIS SERVER IS NOT LEECHED IN ANY WAY!
